forensic.name: Password Recovery
forensic.desc:
0xkn1gh7

Back in 2019, I wrote a secret and encrypted it using a password on Republic Day of India. Now I forgot the password :(

I only have the passgen utility I used and the encrypted file. Can you help me?

forensic.name: RickRoll
forensic.desc:
0xkn1gh7

This song is actually pretty good. Anyways while giving CTFs I came across a rare tool I had never heard of. Pretty sure I would have documented this somewhere.

osint.name: Alias
osint.desc:
0xkn1gh7

Background Check

You have been asked by Sprinklr to do a background check on an intern candidate. The candidate's name is Arnav Kumar Sinha and he's from IIT(BHU), Varanasi, India. Help the company!

There are 7 challenges in this OSINT investigation.

The candidate's known to use a certain 5 digit username on many online platforms. Find that username.

FLAG FORMAT - CodefestCTF{username}

osint.name: CP
osint.desc:
0xkn1gh7

Background Check

You have been asked by Sprinklr to do a background check on an intern candidate. The candidate's name is Arnav Kumar Sinha and he's from IIT(BHU), Varanasi, India. Help the company!

There are 7 challenges in this OSINT investigation.

The candidate is a Competitive Programming enthusiast. Can you find his current and max rating on Codeforces and current rating on CodeChef.

FLAG FORMAT - CodefestCTF{currentCF_maxCF_currentCC}
